[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@css-hooks/core](./core.md) &gt; [MatchHelpers](./core.matchhelpers.md)

## MatchHelpers interface

Helper functions used to construct advanced conditions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MatchHelpers<HookName> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [all(conditions)](./core.matchhelpers.all.md) | Creates a condition that is true when all of the conditions passed as arguments are true. |
|  [any(conditions)](./core.matchhelpers.any.md) | Creates a condition that is true when any of the conditions passed as arguments is true. |
|  [not(condition)](./core.matchhelpers.not.md) | Creates a condition that is true when the specified condition is false. |
